meanings.definition: The state or quality of being asynchronous.
meanings.sent1: The asynchronism of the two clocks caused confusion.
meanings.sent2: The asynchronism between the audio and video made the movie hard to follow.
meanings.sent3: The asynchronism of the dancers' movements created a comedic effect.
meanings.sent4: The asynchronism in their communication led to misunderstandings.
meanings.sent5: The asynchronism in their steps made the dance routine look chaotic.

meanings.sent1: The team's asynchronism in their actions cost them the game.
meanings.sent2: The asynchronism in the traffic lights caused a traffic jam.
meanings.sent3: The asynchronism in their singing made the performance entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The asynchronism in their schedules resulted in missed meetings.
meanings.sent5: The asynchronism in their movements on stage created a unique performance.
